#summary A Brief Description of the Teyjus System and Project

= Teyjus - An Implementation of Lambda Prolog =

The name "Teyjus" is used simultaneously for a family of systems and a project that are both about providing an efficient and (eventually) robust implementation of the language Lambda Prolog
